attributes.action: Protect the police office from prosecution for doing his job.
attributes.additional_details:
The maneuver injured the fleeing suspect. 
The teenager had no license and had already committed a crime resulting in the police giving chase.
attributes.background:
Recently a police officer from the Metropolitan Police conducted a newly authorised tactical stop on a moped rider. 
The police officer now faces prosecution for doing his job and protecting the public. 
This police officer needs to be protected from prosecution, and commended.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Crown Prosecution Service and not the UK Government or Parliament.
